meta.name: Next Level Chef
meta.description: Chef Gordon Ramsay scours the country for the very best line cooks, home chefs, social media stars, food truck owners and everything in between, all competing against one another with the goal of finding the food world's newest superstar. Joined by two elite names in the food world, chefs Nyesha Arrington and Richard Blais, Ramsay and his co-mentors leave no stone unturned, as they each recruit a group of talented chefs and take them under their wings. Ramsay and his friends attempt to bring out the very best in their cooks, as they all try to find "the one." Ramsay firmly believes that as long as a chef has the drive, talent and perseverance, he or she can make that climb to the top. Creativity, consistency and cunning are the recipe for success to make it to the next level, as the competitors adapt to the challenges waiting for them. Chefs compete for a life-changing $250,000 grand prize and the title of "Next Level Chef."

videos.title: Welcome to the Next Level
videos.overview: Fifteen contestants from around the country prepare to level up their cooking skills.

videos.title: High Steaks
videos.overview: Teams are challenged to create the ultimate steak dinner.

videos.title: Infinite Pastabilities
videos.overview: The teams must prove that they can create magic in any environment.

videos.title: Fowl Play
videos.overview: The teams create a poultry dish; the best dish keeps one entire team safe from elimination.

videos.title: The Next Level Burger
videos.overview: Contestants prepare a next-level burger.

videos.title: Drop in for Brunch
videos.overview: Each remaining contestant creates a brunch dish that incorporates both sweet and savory elements.

videos.title: A Seafood Tower
videos.overview: Contestants prepare a seafood dish; two contestants are eliminated.

videos.title: When Pigs Fly
videos.overview: The eight remaining contestants must prepare a next-level pork dish; an elimination.

videos.title: Fusion Confusion
videos.overview: The seven remaining contestants prepare a next-level fusion dish.

videos.title: Show Stopping Semi-Finals
videos.overview: Three contestants are sent home with their dreams up in flames.

videos.title: The Final Level
videos.overview: The final three contestants must create dishes on all three levels in 90 minutes.

videos.title: A Next Level Welcome
videos.overview: Contestants begin their journey and look to make their first impressions in their respective teams.

videos.title: Party Like a Guac Star
videos.overview: The chefs each prepare a dish from Mexico; one contestant is eliminated.

videos.title: No Pain, No Grain
videos.overview: The chefs are challenged with making an upscale sandwich; one chef is eliminated.

videos.title: Rice Guys Finish Last
videos.overview: The chefs are challenged to make a next-level Chinese-inspired dish.

videos.title: Game Time
videos.overview: Game such as wild boar and elk must be cooked with care and attention.

videos.title: Sugar and Tea and Rum
videos.overview: Competitors use skill to cook an alcohol-based dish; one chef is eliminated.

videos.title: Here Fishy, Fishy
videos.overview: Chefs are alarmed when they learn the ins and outs of what it takes to make a next-level fish dish.

videos.title: Going Global
videos.overview: Each person grabs a box with a flag on it and is tasked to make the country's signature dish.

videos.title: Happy Hour
videos.overview: The chefs must create one perfect appetizer dish and pair it with a beautiful craft cocktail.

videos.title: That's What Cheese Said
videos.overview: Cheese, nuts and charcuterie meats prove difficult for the chefs to navigate.

videos.title: Fry Me A River
videos.overview: The remaining chefs must elevate their dish by frying their entree, a process that proves difficult.

videos.title: Bake It 'til You Make It
videos.overview: The chefs are faced with their toughest challenge yet, baking a next-level dessert.

videos.title: Surf and Turf
videos.overview: The chefs are asked to reimagine an old classic -- surf and turf.

videos.title: Made In America
videos.overview: Each chef must select two different boxes, each representing a state and its local ingredients, and then create one inventive fusion dish.

videos.title: Next Level Finale
videos.overview: The final three chefs must create one dish on each level in just 90 minutes; the winner is crowned.

videos.title: Auditions - Social Media
videos.overview: Eight social media stars battle it out on three kitchen levels for a chance at the grand prize.

videos.title: Auditions - Home Cooks
videos.overview: The auditions continue as the home cooks fight a spot in the mentorship team draft.

videos.title: Auditions - Pros
videos.overview: The auditions conclude as the professional chefs battle for one of the coveted five spots.

videos.title: The Draft/Smash Bash
videos.overview: The contestants must prepare an all-American smash burger that proves their cooking abilities.

videos.title: Curry in a Hurry
videos.overview: The 14 remaining chefs are tasked with preparing a curry dish that promises to pack a punch.

videos.title: 80 Degrees and Palm Trees
videos.overview: The 13 remaining chefs prepare a seafood dish inspired by tropical island cuisine.

videos.title: On the Go
videos.overview: The chefs are tasked with preparing a next-level international street food dish.

videos.title: Don't Have a Cow, Man
videos.overview: The chefs butcher and break down various cuts of beef amongst their teams to create steak dishes.

videos.title: You Wanna Pizza Me?
videos.overview: The contestants must elevate traditional pizza into a next-level masterpiece.

videos.title: It's All Greek to Me
videos.overview: The chef who prepares the best Greek entree wins immunity for their team.

videos.title: Squad Goals
videos.overview: The eight remaining competitors must work together in teams to create a cohesive three-course meal.

videos.title: Bingo, Bango, Bento!
videos.overview: The seven remaining chefs must create Japanese-inspired dishes for their bento boxes.

videos.title: Picture Perfect
videos.overview: The six remaining chefs are tasked with recreating a "picture perfect" dish using just a photo. However, once the platform leaves, the photo goes with it, putting the contestant's memory and cooking skills to the test.

videos.title: Kombucha Kulture
videos.overview: The final five chefs must create a dish that won't leave a sour taste in the judges' mouth by using kombucha, the trendy fermented drink. Then, two chefs battle for a spot in the semifinals by cooking a winning dish using a wok.

videos.title: Taste of Success
videos.overview: In the semi-finals, the final four chefs face a tangy twist as they're tasked with showcasing one of the classic taste elements. With limited time on the clock, every dash, pinch or sprinkle could mean the difference between securing a coveted spot in the grand finale or facing the heat in a final elimination cook-off.

videos.title: The Final Level
videos.overview: The competition reaches its boiling point as the final three chefs race against the clock to craft a sensational three-course meal. With $250,000 and a year-long mentorship on the line, only one chef will rise to the top and claim the title of the Next Level Chef champion.

videos.title: Social Media Chef Auditions
videos.overview: Eight social media chefs kick off the competition.

videos.title: Home Chef Auditions
videos.overview: The auditions continue with the next group to show off their culinary skills -- the home cooks.

videos.title: Pro Chef Auditions
videos.overview: Eight professional chefs must impress the judges in order to advance to the next stage.

videos.title: Ciao Down
videos.overview: The chefs who qualified for the draft are matched with their mentors and are given a team challenge.

videos.title: Grills Gone Wild
videos.overview: In the elimination round, two chefs go head-to-head and make an elevated dish using cauliflower.

videos.title: Shoyu My Ramen
videos.overview: The mentors challenge the chefs to make a ramen dish while reaching from a fast moving platform.

videos.title: The Menu
videos.overview: The chefs work to create a cohesive five-course meal, with the help of a few surprise sous chefs.

videos.title: Beat the Heat
videos.overview: The remaining chefs are tasked with oven roasting, steaming or deep frying.

videos.title: The Thunderdome
videos.overview: The chefs are no longer working on teams and must survive the next cooking challenge on their own.

videos.title: A Very Special O' Cajun
videos.overview: The chefs are tasked with cooking Cajun dishes that blend southern flare with French influence.

videos.title: Tapas In
videos.overview: The chefs experiment with Spanish cuisine; three chefs serve up vibrant plates of paella.

videos.title: Bad to the Bone
videos.overview: The six chefs must cook protein with the bone in, which is no small feat in the essence of time.

videos.title: Always Crust Your Instincts
videos.overview: The five remaining chefs are tasked with recreating Gordon Ramsay's beef Wellington without beef.

videos.title: Final Level
videos.overview: The final three chefs must create an outstanding three-course meal in just 90 minutes.
